piece_OdinsUndercroft_description: Large basement with several rooms. Only for wealthy Vikings <color=#34ebb4>OdinsUndercroft</color>
rae_iron_sharpstakes_desc: Wood stakes protect against Troll attacks <color=#34ebb4>OdinArchitect</color>
piece_marblepile_desc: A pile of neatly stacked black marble <color=#34ebb4>Valheim</color>
refined_stakewall_1_desc: Heavy fence made of sharpened logs <color=#34ebb4>OdinArchitect</color>
refined_stakewall_2_desc: Heavy fence made of sharpened logs reinforced with iron <color=#34ebb4>OdinArchitect</color>
wooden_fence_1_gate_desc: Door for a stable, durable fence <color=#34ebb4>OdinArchitect</color>
wooden_fence_2_gate_desc: Flimsy door for a simple fence <color=#34ebb4>OdinArchitect</color>
piece_freyastatue_description: The goddess of love and daughter of the Vans. Praise her by installing this beautiful statue in the most beautiful place of your home <color=#34ebb4>Yggdrasil Server</color>
piece_snakestatue_desc: A statue from the destroyed lair of the Queen of the Lakes <color=#34ebb4>Yggdrasil Server</color>
piece_goblinstatue_desc: A silent guardian, will make your construction more majestic <color=#34ebb4>Yggdrasil Server</color>
piece_gatekeeperstatue_desc: An intimidating guardian, will make your construction more majestic <color=#34ebb4>Yggdrasil Server</color>
drawbridge01_desc: Drawbridge made of wood and iron with one-way lifting <color=#34ebb4>More Gates</color>
drawbridge02_desc: Drawbridge made of wood and iron with central extension <color=#34ebb4>More Gates</color>
piece_wooddoor_desc: The simplest door made of wood <color=#34ebb4>Valheim</color>
piece_amagiclightbig_desc: A bluish light dispersing the fog. Radius 70m <color=#34ebb4>Yggdrasil Server</color>
item_eikthyressence_desc: A magical extract from the head of the first Fallen.
item_ancientsouls_description: A soul extracted from an ancient swamp creature.
item_bucketofsausages_desc: A load of tasty sausages from Golund's special recipe.
item_lockofhair_desc: A piece of the goddamn kid's hair.
item_questpotion1_desc: A potion prepared according to ancient rites for eternal rest.
item_questpotion2_desc: A flask of the Queen of the Lake's ancestral poison.
item_questpotion3_desc: An improved potion prepared according to an ancient rite for eternal rest.
item_whisperingrune_description: A rune with evil inscriptions that makes a strange noise.
item_druidrune_description: A rune once wielded by the druids who guarded the magical forests.
item_wardrune1_description: A rune that allows you to level up your ward to level 2.
item_wardrune2_description: A rune that allows you to level up your ward to level 3.
item_wardrune3_description: A rune that allows you to level up your ward to level 4.
item_wardrune4_description: A rune that allows you to level up your ward to level 5.
item_questgift_desc: A casket, beautifully ornamented, intended as a gift to Seydkona.
item_scrollquest_desc: A scroll with sketches of a magical recipe.
item_scrollquest2_desc: I'm finally sailing home, it's been so long since I've seen you, my brother. There's some lovely rocks up ahead, I'll stop by and see if I can catch you a mermaid as a present! Prepare the finest mead, your brother Sidney. <color=#34ebb4>Yggdrasil: quest item</color>
item_scrollquest3_desc: On the way we found a ship overgrown with moss and mushrooms, it seemed deserted, but how wrong I was! The ghosts of dead sailors blocked our way and we almost died! I thought such a ship was the only one, but as I traveled the ocean, I met many of them... <color=#34ebb4>Yggdrasil: quest item</color>
item_scrollquest4_desc: When we docked at a small island, we only wanted to get some stone for our needs, but we found a real treasure island! But for the treasure we had to pay with the life of a comrade... He was killed by the Guardian, who jealously guarded his riches... <color=#34ebb4>Yggdrasil: quest item</color>
item_lokihelmetquest_description: The helmet of the god Loki himself. Everyone would like to try it on.
item_lokihelmet_description: The helmet of the god Loki himself. Everyone would like to try it on.
item_nornpthread_description: It is not just a thread, it is the whole life of a living being, woven by the norn at the roots of Yggdrasil.
item_amuletoftruth_description: An amulet that will make anyone speak only the truth. It has a limited time of validity.
item_birchflesh_description: A substance extracted from a mighty birch elder.
item_surtlingsoul_description: The soul of the Surtling, holding a piece of Surtr within it.
item_blood_of_elders_description: An artifact that allows human to enter the magical portal of the Ash lands.
item_blood_of_elders2_description: An artifact that allows the dwergers to pass through the magical portal of the Ash lands.
item_pieceofmemory1_description: To collect the Rune of Memory, you must combine all 4 memory shards.
item_pieceofmemory2_description: To create Essence of fire, obtain 20 Fire petals and combine them with 20 Surtling cores.
item_pieceofmemory3_description: To create a Shard of sword soul, combine a Rune of Memory and Essence of fire. To create a Soul Crystal of Surtr, combine 10 Soul of surtling with 20 Flametal.
item_pieceofmemory4_description: Bring together the Shard of sword soul with the Soul Crystal of Surtr. May the sword be united with its master! Sacrifice the Soul Crystal to the fire of the altar!
item_bananaknife_description: A sneaky thief's shiv, puts your guard down.
item_bananaknifebroken_description: This item once served the Thief well until it broke.
item_firepetals_description: And the sword shattered into many fragments, which the earth absorbed, and fire flowers grew on it, beautiful and dangerous.
item_oldkey_description: An old key of the old masters of these places, it can probably still open some door.
item_kingkey_description: The key to the King of the ancients hiding place.
item_bopkey_description: A beautiful key that the Thief stole somewhere.
item_keyprison_description: The key to the dungeon door.
item_keyseydkona_description: The key to the basement of the Seydkona.
item_blueprintscroll_description: A blueprint for building an ancient people's forge.
item_blueprintext1scroll_description: A blueprint for building an upgrade to the ancient people's forge.
item_blueprintscroll_freyastatue_descrip: Detailed blueprint for building Statue of Freya.
item_blueprintscroll_goblinstatue_descri: Detailed blueprint for building Statue of Immortal Guardian.
item_blueprintscroll_snakestatue_descrip: Detailed blueprint for building Statue of Serpent.
item_blueprintscroll_gatekeeperstatue_de: Detailed blueprint for building Statue of Gate Keeper.
item_relictp_desc: A magical artifact kept in her basement by the v√∂lva.
item_bottleofmild_desc: A drink that the gods themselves could drink.
item_boptrash_description: A pile of junk the Thief slipped you for treating him badly.
item_bossesessence_desc: A powerful artifact capable of opening a portal between worlds.
item_wendigoscrap_description: The hide is like a hide, very soft in appearance.
item_fireessence_description: Extract from Fire petals and Surtling cores.
item_pieceofsoul_desc: A shard that absorbed the remnants of Surtr's soul.
item_soulofsword_desc: The sword was broken, but its soul is alive.
item_tearhealing_description: A healing substance that can heal all wounds.
item_soulofsurtr_desc: A crystal that absorbed Surtr's soul and the soul of his sword.
item_runememory_description: Keeping the memory of ancient events a rune.
item_moderpotion_desc: The best potion for sea travel, Wind will serve you well.
item_helmet_elder_description: The helmet of an ancient warrior, once crowned but forgotten.
item_chest_elder_description: The cuirass of an ancient warrior, once crowned but forgotten.
item_legs_elder_description: The greaves of an ancient warrior, once crowned but forgotten.
item_mace_iron_enchanted_description: A mace created by the Dvergers smiths for the einherjar.
item_sword_surtr_description: A replica of the sword of the Lord of Muspelheim himself.
item_ygg_swordsnake_desc: A sword that once belonged to the ancestors of the Queen of the Lakes.
item_ygg_swordrunic_desc: A sword with shimmering runes that shine in the night.
item_ygg_ironshieldrunic_desc: A shield with shimmering runes that shine in the night.
item_ygg_scytherunic_desc: A scythe with shimmering runes that shine in the night.
item_firebomb_description: Beware the fire that devours everything.
item_saddletroll_desc: Can't ride a troll without a saddle.
item_saddleeikthyr_description: An item that allows you to ride the Duneyrr himself.
item_eikthyrsummon_desc: An item that allows you to summon and saddle the great deer Duneyrr.
item_mask_surt_description: An intimidating mask capable of turning enemies to flight.
item_swampchildcape_description: A cape once worn by ancient warriors.
item_coindvergers_desc: A special coin for the best goods.
item_coinquests_desc: A coin given out for quests and adventurous explorations.
item_cointrading_desc: A coin that can be obtained for trucking and the tasks associated with it.
item_coinheart_desc: An item through which any offense can be forgiven.
item_snakestatueitem_description: An ancestral heirloom of the Snake clan.
item_snakeegg_description: Queen of the Lake egg. The unusual coloring is mesmerizing.
item_pack_blacksmithsupply_desc: A cargo of spare parts and materials for repairing things.
item_pack_buildmats_desc: A pack of raw building materials. Why anyone would even order them...
item_pack_campingpile_desc: A pack of soft hiking pillows. Even their look is putting you to sleep.
item_pack_cargoforjarlshouse_desc: A cargo of gifts for the local Jarl. Don't shuffle.
item_pack_corruptset_desc: A set for some not-so-bright ritual. It's uncomfortable to be nearby.
item_pack_drengsprovision_desc: Standard kit for a novice warrior.
item_pack_eddainspiration_desc: A pack for an ancient rite. Why would they need so many horns?
item_pack_farpack_desc: A cargo of supplies from afar in a heavy-duty package. From its appearance, these cargoes travel more than your entire village. The rune on the lid means: Journey.
item_pack_fireplacedecor_desc: A cargo of hunting trophies. Nothing fancy, but looks great in any home.
item_pack_foringbattleamulets_desc: A traditional set of items that bring good luck in battle. They honor only the most successful warriors who manage to survive the most difficult battles.
item_pack_fortunetellingkit_desc: Who wouldn't want to look into the future or predict the outcome of a battle?
item_pack_fragrantvenison_desc: Deer jerky cooked according to the old recipe of the Northerners. The smell makes you drown in your own saliva.
item_pack_freyablessing_desc: A traditional set for an ancient rite in honor of the goddess of lust and fertility. Somehow the cargo smells like love itself. The druids...
item_pack_gimmicksforhof_desc: A set of various oddities from around the world. Such things are not easy to find.
item_pack_grimnirgift_desc: The cargo looks magical. Probably for some kind of those old dark rituals.
item_pack_huntersupplies_desc: Standard hunter's kit for long journeys into the wilderness.
item_pack_konunggift_desc: A traditional gift to the House of Conong. Every Viking dreams of receiving such a gift one day.
item_pack_lootedfromthevillage_desc: A set of trophies taken from ravaged goblin villages.
item_pack_manurecargo_desc: A cargo of farmers treasure. If the wind gets lucky, the arrival will be noticed before the ship even appears on the horizon.
item_pack_mildbeerpack_desc: A supply of special holidays drinks. Someone is having a feast!
item_pack_pyromancerkit_desc: The cargo looks obviously explosive. It is better not to take pyromaniacs on this journey.
item_pack_qualitybuildmats_desc: A pack of good building materials. Its hard to find things like that.
item_pack_remainsoftree_desc: The remains of various tree-like monsters. The air around seems a little denser.
item_pack_resourcesofdangerousland_desc: A shipment of material from the most dangerous and deadly corners of the world.
item_pack_rookiethiefsbox_desc: It looks like the kit of a novice thief. The guild is always around...
item_pack_scarecrowcargo_desc: A set of parts and finished garden scarecrows. Someone obviously wants a bigger harvest.
item_pack_seydbelongings_desc: The cargo stinks of death and the stench of swamps. It's scary to think who would want to do THIS and why.
item_pack_seydrel_desc: A cargo with the most inscrutable thing in this world, literally no one knows what to do with it. When these things are together, they clearly behave stranger than usual.
item_pack_shroompork_desc: A pack of pork salted in mushrooms. An ancient recipe of the North - long storage and almost no smell.
item_pack_skinbale_desc: A cargo with tightly packed bales of hides. Probably for some mountain adventure.
item_pack_soothingbalm_desc: A pack of good-quality healing wound balm.
item_pack_tamingfire_desc: A cargo of trophies from the world's most evil creature. One sight makes you think of never carrying anything ever again.
item_pack_thronedecor_desc: A set of traditional decorations for Jarl's throne. It would be an honor to deliver such a shipment.
item_pack_treasurehuntersswag_desc: Standard dungeon survival kit. Someone experienced assembled it, not even forgetting the chains.
item_pack_vikingsbelongings_desc: A load of someone's belongings. Apparently, someone's moving.
item_pack_wedgift_desc: A gift for the young. According to the precepts, the more tears Mouder sheds, the happier the bride will live.
item_terrine_desc: A favorite dish of strong warriors.
item_dukesjellybread_desc: A simple treat on long journeys.
item_broth_desc: A rich extract from the bones.
item_pancakes_desc: A favorite treat of the old Vikings.
item_sausageinbread_desc: What could be more nourishing than your favorite sausage in dough?
item_vegetablesmoothie_desc: Not very tasty, but a healthy drink.
item_flaxseeds_desc: An ingredient for many healthy dishes.
item_salt_desc: The most necessary ingredient for cooking.
item_helmet_trolltar_description: A tar-smeared troll skin helmet that allows you to remain as invisible as possible.
item_chest_trolltar_description: A tar-smeared troll skin tunic that allows you to remain as invisible as possible.
item_legs_trolltar_description: A tar-smeared troll skin pants that allows you to remain as invisible as possible.
item_cape_trolltar_description: A tar-smeared troll skin cape that allows you to remain as invisible as possible.
trophy_lord_abyss: Trophy: Lord of the Sea Abyss
trophy_lord_abyss_desc: The head still whispers words from the great abyss... Maybe it's not truly dead. <color=#34ebb4>Outsiders</color>
abyssorb_desc: An item from the depths of the ocean. Can speed up ships <color=#34ebb4>Outsiders</color>
lore_plains_tarcave_label: Pesky and deadly creatures, black as night. Can't pass by, can't cut down a tree. Let us build them with stone, and let only the strong of spirit enter and get tar!
lore_bopcave: One day the Thief found a chest of delights and was very happy. After that he found many things and hid many things, but never again was he as happy as he was then...
lore_mountains_silvercave: The Jotuns descendants are strong, but insane. The veins were torn out by the roots and placed in caves. They guard their treasures jealously. Enter and get the silver! Or die unsung by the skalds
lore_smugglercave: Once the Thief sat under the stairs for 2 weeks and after that he became very famous. There are few who remember those times, only the Aesir in Asgard remember...
mod_epicloot_assets_dust_introduce: The remant upon the sacrificial altar. Used to enchant items. Obtained by sacrificing magic items.
mod_epicloot_assets_shard_introduce: A sliver of monstrous lifeforce. Used to augment magic items. Obtained by sacrificing animal and monster trophies.
mod_epicloot_assets_runestone_introduce: A catalyst of empyreal potential. Used to enchant or augment magic items.Obtained by sacrificing powerful trophies.
mod_epicloot_assets_reagent_introduce: A form representing pure synthesis. Used to enchant or augment armor and shields. Obtained by sacrificing magic armor or shields.
mod_epicloot_assets_essence_introduce: The distilled protean power to change one's environment. Used to enchant or augment weapons and tools. Obtained by sacrificing magic weapons or tools.
mod_epicloot_assets_silverring_introduce: An intricately wrought loop of fine silver.
mod_epicloot_assets_goldrubyring_introdu: A beautiful ring of fine gold, set with a square-cut ruby.
mod_epicloot_assets_leatherbelt_introduc: A common leather belt. Holds your pants up.
mod_epicloot_assets_andvaranaut_introduc: A dwarven-crafted ring in the shape of a dragon. Supposedly,it will guide any who wear it to sources of gold, but this one seems to be cursed to only find Haldor's treasure chests.
mod_epicloot_assets_enchanter_introduce: A mystical piece of ancient enchantment technology. Wizards say that the Enchanting Table is more functional.
mod_epicloot_assets_augmenter_introduce: A mystical piece of ancient augmentation technology. Scholars say it's powers are no more!
mod_epicloot_assets_enchantingtable_desc: Allows Sacrificing, Enchanting, and Augmenting magic items.
mod_epicloot_assets_foresttoken_introduc: A small metal token bearing a brilliant green leaf insignia.
mod_epicloot_assets_goldbountytoken_intr: Only the greatest monster-slayers of Valheim carry these heavy.
mod_epicloot_assets_ironbountytoken_intr: A toothy iron skull that commemorates your deeds.
mod_epicloot_sacrifice_warning: This item will be DESTROYED as a SACRIFICE to the gods.
mod_epicloot_sacrifice_explanation_multi: Destroy the selected items and receive:
mod_epicloot_sacrifice_productsexplainer: Destroy the selected items and receive:
mod_epicloot_augment_explain: Replace one magical effect. Once an effect has been augmented, the others are locked.
mod_epicloot_augment_deprecated: This effect is a deprecated effect. The augment is free, but you will not be able to keep the effect.
mod_epicloot_disenchantexplain: Disenchant an item, returning it to its non-magical state, ready to be enchanted again.
mod_epicloot_featureinfo_none: Select a feature from the list to the left to view upgrade options.
mod_epicloot_featureinfo_sacrifice:
Sacrifice magic items and trophies, destroying them to produce enchanting materials.
When upgraded, gain a chance to recieve double the items normally gained from the sacrifice.
mod_epicloot_featureinfo_convertmaterial:
Upgrade enchanting materials to higher rarity, convert shards to enchanting materials of equal rarity, and salvage other materials from junk.
When upgraded, improve the item ratio when upgrading runestones and other crafting materials.
mod_epicloot_featureinfo_enchant:
Spend enchanting materials to add magic effects to non-magic gear. Requires runestones.
When upgraded, gain an improved chance to roll more magic effects on an enchanted item.
mod_epicloot_featureinfo_augment:
Spend enchanting materials to re-roll individual magic effects on magic gear.
When upgraded, gain additional choices when agumenting, and have a reduced cost for multiple augments.
mod_epicloot_featureinfo_disenchant:
Spend materials to remove the magic effects from an item, returning it to its non-magical state.
When upgraded, gain a chance to recover sacrifice materials when disenchanting (not affected by Sacrifice feature level) and decrease the cost of disenchanting.
mod_epicloot_featureinfo_helheim:
Plunge the realm of Valheim into Helheim, making creatures dangerous but increasing the drop rate of magic items.
When upgraded, ????????
mod_epicloot_item_andvaranaut_tooltip: Helps you find treasure chests from Haldor's maps. Move in the direction the pings get more intense.
mod_epicloot_item_andvaranaut_startmsg: You can sense gold(No, wait, just Haldor's treasure chests. Dammit Loki!)
mod_epicloot_se_bulwark_tooltip: Heimdall's Legacy protects you from all damage!
mod_epicloot_se_undying_tooltip: Heimdall saves you from certain death! Gain immunity from damage for 3 seconds.
mod_epicloot_se_undying_startmessage: Heimdall saves you from certain death!
mod_epicloot_se_berserker_tooltip: You cannot regenerate health, but deal +50% to +200% damage based on health missing.
mod_epicloot_bounties_noroomtooltip: No room in inventory for reward
mod_epicloot_bounties_tooltip: Travel to the <color=#31eb41>$1</color> and locate $2 the <color=#f03232>$3</color>. $4. Return to me when it is done.
mod_epicloot_gamble_tooltip: Pay a premium for a chance at a magic item!
mod_epicloot_merchant_abandonbountydesc: It may not be accepted again
mod_epicloot_treasuremap_tooltip: This folded piece of ragged parchment has a big red X marked on it, somewhere in the $1...
mod_epicloot_me_modifyphysicaldamage_des: Increase the physical damage (blunt, slash, pierce, chop, pickaxe) done by the magic weapon by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyelementaldamage_de: Increase the elemental damage (fire, frost, lightning, poison, spirit) done by the magic weapon by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_modifydurability_desc: Increase the maximum durability of the magic item by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_reduceweight_desc: Reduce the weight of the magic item by -X%.
mod_epicloot_me_removespeedpenalty_desc: Wearing or wielding this magic item does not penalize the player's movement speed.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyblockpower_desc: Increase the block armor of the magic item by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyparry_desc: Increase the parry block armor, parry force, and parry bonus of the magic by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyarmor_desc: Increase the armor value of the magic equipment by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_modifybackstab_desc: Increase the backstab multiplier of the magic weapon by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_increasehealth_desc: Increase the player's base maximum health by +X.
mod_epicloot_me_increasestamina_desc: Increase the player's base maximum stamina by +X.
mod_epicloot_me_increaseeitr_desc: Increase the player's base maximum eitr by +X.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyhealthregen_desc: Increase the player's health regeneration by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_addhealthregen_desc: Increase the player's base health regeneration by +X health per tick.
mod_epicloot_me_modifystaminaregen_desc: Increase the player's stamina regeneration by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyeitrregen_desc: Increase the player's eitr regeneration by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_addbluntdamage_desc: Add +X% of the total damage of this weapon as blunt damage to attacks made by the magic weapon.
mod_epicloot_me_addslashingdamage_desc: Add +X% of the total damage of this weapon as slash damage to attacks made by the magic weapon. If the weapon is an axe, add the same amount of chop damage.
mod_epicloot_me_addpiercingdamage_desc: Add +X% of the total damage of this weapon as pierce damage to attacks made by the magic weapon. If the item is a pickaxe, add the same amount of pickaxe damage.
mod_epicloot_me_addfiredamage_desc: Add +X% of the total damage of this weapon as fire damage to attacks made by the magic weapon.
mod_epicloot_me_addfrostdamage_desc: Add +X% of the total damage of this weapon as frost damage to attacks made by the magic weapon.
mod_epicloot_me_addlightningdamage_desc: Add +X% of the total damage of this weapon as lightning damage to attacks made by the magic weapon.
mod_epicloot_me_addpoisondamage_desc: Add +X% of the total damage of this weapon as poison damage to attacks made by the magic weapon
mod_epicloot_me_addspiritdamage_desc: Add +X% of the total damage of this weapon as spirit damage to attacks made by the magic weapon.
mod_epicloot_me_addfireresistancepercent: The player reduces all fire damage taken by +X%. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_addfrostresistancepercen: The player reduces all frost damage taken by +X%. This effect does not provide protection from environmental effects. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_addlightningresistancepe: The player reduces all lightning damage taken by +X%. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_addpoisonresistanceperce: The player reduces all poison damage taken by +X%. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_addspiritresistanceperce: The player reduces all spirit damage taken by +X%. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_addelementalresistancepe: The player reduces all elemental damage (fire, frost, lightning, poison) taken by +X%. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_addbluntresistancepercen: The player reduces all blunt damage taken by +X%. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_addslashingresistanceper: The player reduces all slash damage taken by +X%. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_addpiercingresistanceper: The player reduces all pierce damage taken by +X%. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_addchoppingresistanceper: The player reduces all chopping damage taken by +X%. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_addphysicalresistanceper: The player reduces all physical damage (blunt, slash, pierce) taken by +X%. This effect stacks cumulatively with other damage reduction effects equipped by the player.
mod_epicloot_me_modifymovementspeed_desc: Increase the player's movement speed by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_modifysprintstaminause_d: Reduce the player's sprint stamina usage by -X%.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyjumpstaminause_des: Reduce the player's jump stamina usage by -X%.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyattackstaminause_d: Reduce the player's attack stamina usage by -X%.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyblockstaminause_de: Reduce the player's block stamina usage by -X%.
mod_epicloot_me_indestructible_desc: The magic item does not use durability and will never break.
mod_epicloot_me_weightless_desc: The magic item has a weight of 0.
mod_epicloot_me_addcarryweight_desc: Increase the player's maximum carry weight capacity by +X.
mod_epicloot_me_lifesteal_desc: The player heals for X% of total damage done with each attack.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyattackspeed_desc: Attacks made with the magic weapon are +X% faster.
mod_epicloot_me_throwable_desc: The player may use the secondary attack to throw the magic weapon.
mod_epicloot_me_waterproof_desc: While wearing the magical equipment, the player will not get wet in the rain. Immersion in water will still make the player wet.
mod_epicloot_me_paralyze_desc: Enemies hit with attacks made by the magic weapon will be paralyzed, unable to move or attack, for X seconds.
mod_epicloot_me_doublejump_desc: While in the air, the player may jump an additional time.
mod_epicloot_me_waterwalk_desc: While equipped with the magic equipment, the player may walk on the surface of any body of water. The player may equip the item while swimming.
mod_epicloot_me_explosivearrows_desc: Ranged attacks made by the magic weapon deal +X% attack damage in an area of effect around the projectile impact.
mod_epicloot_me_quickdraw_desc: Increases the draw speed of the magic bow by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_addswordsskill_desc: Increases the player's swords skill level by +X. This may cause the skill level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addknivesskill_desc: Increases the player's knives skill level by +X. This may cause the skill level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addclubsskill_desc: Increases the player's clubs skill level by +X. This may cause the skill level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addpolearmsskill_desc: Increases the player's polearms skill level by +X. This may cause the skill level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addspearsskill_desc: Increases the player's spears skill level by +X. This may cause the skill level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addblockingskill_desc: Increases the player's blocking skill level by +X. This may cause the skill level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addaxesskill_desc: Increases the player's axes and woodcutting skill levels by +X. This may cause the skills' level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addbowsskill_desc: Increases the player's bows skill level by +X. This may cause the skill level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addbloodmagicskill_desc: Increases the player's blood magic skill levels by +X. This may cause the skills' level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addelementalmagicskill_d: Increases the player's elemental magic skill level by +X. This may cause the skill level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addunarmedskill_desc: Increases the player's unarmed skill level by +X. This may cause the skill level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addpickaxesskill_desc: Increases the player's pickaxes skill level by +X. This may cause the skill level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_addmovementskills_desc: Increases the player's run, jump, swim, and sneak skill levels by +X. This may cause the skills' level to increase above 100.
mod_epicloot_me_modifystaggerduration_de: Increase the stagger duration by +X% against enemies when staggered by attacks from the magic weapon.
mod_epicloot_me_recallweapon_desc: The thrown magic weapon automatically returns to the player after being thrown.
mod_epicloot_me_reflectdamage_desc: Reflect +X% of damage back to attacker
mod_epicloot_me_avoiddamagetaken_desc: The player has a +X% chance to automatically avoid all damage from an attack.
mod_epicloot_me_staggerondamagetaken_des: Increase the chance to stagger the enemy by +X% for attacks made with the magic weapon.
mod_epicloot_me_featherfall_desc: The player falls slowly and is immune to fall damage.
mod_epicloot_me_modifydiscoveryradius_de: The player's map discovery radius is increased by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_freebuild_desc: When using the magic hammer, buildings can be built without the required crafting station nearby.
mod_epicloot_me_comfortable_desc: When resting and wearing the magic equipment, the player's comfort level is increased by +X.
mod_epicloot_me_modifymovementspeedlowhe: The player's movement speed is increased by +X% when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyhealthregenlowheal: The player's health regene is increased by +X% when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_modifystaminaregenlowhea: The player's stamina regen is increased by +X% when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyeitrregenlowhealth: The player's eitr regen is increased by +X% when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyarmorlowhealth_des: The player's total armor is increased by +X% when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_modifydamagelowhealth_de: The player's total damage is increased by +X% when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyblockpowerlowhealt: The player's block armor is increased by +X% when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyparrylowhealth_des: The player's parry block armor, parry force, and parry bonus are increased by +X% when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyattackspeedlowheal: The player's attack speed is increased by +X% when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_avoiddamagetakenlowhealt: The player's chance to avoid incoming attacks is increased by +X% when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_lifesteallowhealth_desc: The player heals for +X% of attack damage when below 30% health.
mod_epicloot_me_glowing_desc: The player glows with a faint light.
mod_epicloot_me_executioner_desc: The first attack on an enemy that is below 20% health deals +X% damage.
mod_epicloot_me_riches_desc: Slain enemies have a +X% increased chance to drop coins or treasure.
mod_epicloot_me_opportunist_desc: Attacks made against staggered enemies have a +X% chance to deal backstab damage.
mod_epicloot_me_duelist_desc: When using the magic weapon without anything in the player's off hand, its block armor is increased by +X% of the weapon's attack power, and its parry force is increased by +X/2% of the weapon's attack power.
mod_epicloot_me_immovable_desc: The player is immune to knockback and stagger while blocking with the magic shield.
mod_epicloot_me_modifystaggerdamage_desc: Increase damage to staggered enemies by +X%.
mod_epicloot_me_luck_desc: Increase the chance to find higher rarity magic items.
mod_epicloot_me_modifyparrywindow_desc: Increase the time window for blocks to count as a parry by +X ms.
mod_epicloot_me_slow_desc: Slows the attack and movement speed of creatures being hit by +X% for 2 seconds. Bosses are immune to this effect.
mod_epicloot_me_doublemagicshot_desc: Elemental Magic attacks fire twice, instead of once.
mod_epicloot_me_triplebowshot_desc: Bow attacks fire 3x ammo, instead of one.
mod_epicloot_set_me_bulwark: Bulwark [Activated]: Prevent all damage for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 60 seconds.
mod_epicloot_set_me_undying: Undying [Passive]: On death, regain full health. Cooldown: 20 minutes.
mod_epicloot_set_me_frostdamageaoe_displ: Melee attacks that deal frost damage deal an additional 50% of weapon damage as frost in a cone in front of the attacker.
mod_epicloot_set_me_berserker: Berserker [Activated]: For 10 seconds, you cannot regenerate health, but you gain +50% to +200% damage based on health missing. Cooldown: 3 minutes.
mod_epicloot_l_luff: Lancing Luff's Lancer Lance of Lancing
mod_epicloot_l_dyrnwyn_desc: Sword of King Ryhdderch Hael the Generous. When drawn by a worthy soul, the entire blade blazes with fire.
mod_epicloot_l_sleipnirshoof_desc: A gnarled and mummified horse's foreleg. The hoof is incredibly hard and sharp. Those who weild it feel the urge to gallop.
mod_epicloot_l_gungnir_desc: Fashioned from the wood of the world tree Yggdrasil and engraved with the contracts from which Odin's power derives.
mod_epicloot_l_mjolnir_desc: "Mjolnir hurled forth towards the savage crew, and slew all the mountain-giants, who with Hyimir had him pursued." -Hymiskvida, Poetic Edda
mod_epicloot_l_lokis_desc: Created to destroy the falcon V√≠√∞√≥pnir, it crackles with godlike energies.
mod_epicloot_l_valk_desc: Those nearest to death are closest to glory.
mod_epicloot_l_skofnung_desc: The blade of legendary king Hr√≥lfr Kraki, supernaturally sharp and imbued with the souls of his 12 faithful berserker bodyguards.
mod_epicloot_l_gram_desc: The blade pulled from the tree, broken by Odin and reforged by dwarves, the slayer of Fafnir- it is the legendary blade itself!
mod_epicloot_l_angurvadal_desc: Inscribed with runes, the sword of Fritiof is dim in times of peace, but brightly glows in times of war.
mod_epicloot_l_shard_desc: Forged from shards harvested from the shattered edges of reality iself, from when Valheim was sundered from the realms.
mod_epicloot_l_gunnar_desc: Gunnar H√°mundarson's legendary Atgeir, said to sing when taken down for battle. It cuts as sharp as any song.
mod_epicloot_l_skadi_desc: The favored weapon of the goddess of the hunt, it's weilder is imbued with the swiftness of her legendary skis.
mod_epicloot_l_ullr_desc: Ullr's mighty bow of the winter hunt, often given as a reward to those who have done favors for Odin. It seems that you are the latest to have gained his gratitude.
mod_epicloot_l_endbow_desc: Forged from star fire and imbued with the legacy of your heroic deeds, this bow will never fail you. The Hunter of the Forsaken will never falter.
mod_epicloot_l_spite_desc: In the aftermath of a epic, primordial battle, an illusive Celestial Being forged this weapon to spite the Black Sun.
mod_epicloot_l_lind_desc: Let all those who think they are safe and forever protected know- Odin's war is coming.
mod_epicloot_l_hofund_desc: The sword of Heimdall, the watchman of the gods and the keeper of the Bifrost bridge to Asgard. This blade is truly worthy of the eternal watchman.
mod_epicloot_l_njord_desc: The god Nj«´rd, ruler of wind, sea, and riches, caught a piece of hurricane gale and fashioned it into this knife. A blade as swift and cutting as the northern wind.
mod_epicloot_l_bloodmace_desc: The spirits of the deathsquitos remain in this weapon, thirsting to drink deep of blood and grow strong.
mod_epicloot_l_heimdalltowershield_desc: None shall cross the burning rainbow bridge of Bifrost whilst Heimdall bars the way.
mod_epicloot_l_heimdallhelmet_desc: "Nine Jotunn maids gave birth, to the gracious god, Heimdall, at the world's edge. Strong was he made with the might of the Earth, with the ice-cold Sea, and with Boar's blood." -Voluspa hin skamma, Poetic Edda
mod_epicloot_l_heimdallchest_desc: You, warrior, enter the sanctuary of Himinbjorg. Be at rest in Heimdall's tranquil home and drink joyful of the good mead.
mod_epicloot_l_heimdalllegs_desc: Heimdall, in his eternal vigilance, was blessed by the Aesir to appear precisely where and when he was needed the most.
mod_epicloot_l_ragnarbattleaxe_desc: The blade that sliced the dire-serpent's head from its body, thus winning Ragnar the affections of Thora Borgarhjort.
mod_epicloot_l_ragnarcape_desc: Provides you with wisdom, cunning, and mastery of battle tactics. Especially when invading Northumbria.
mod_epicloot_l_ragnarchest_desc: Wear this cuirass when you seek vengeance or justice.
mod_epicloot_l_ragnarlegs_desc: Go forth, and inflict great slaughter upon the enemy, gained from the strength of your Ironsides.
btm_haldormead_description: A basic mead brewed by dvergers, teleports you back to your home
btm_odinmead_description: A special mead brewed for Nidavellir's king, teleports you back to your home without any restrictions
btm_knarrmead_description: A basic mead brewed for Elder, teleports you back to your previous saved location
btm_huginmead_description: A special mead brewed by Master Magic, teleports you back to the The Heaven's Hall
btm_herculesmead_description: A special mead brewed for captain of the guard. Gives you special buff which doubles your max carry weight
btm_dvergrmead_description: A special mead brewed by Haldor, it teleports you instantly to Trader Haldor
btm_hildirsmead_description: A special mead brewed by Hildir, it teleports you instantly to Hildirs Camp
